name: MadPrincess
description:
Not the typical princess story!
The mischievous princess's escape from the unlimited Castle!

A casual game with both arcade and action elements packed!

A spellbound warrior who is under the witch's control and...
The witch who loves him so much that has become blinded by jealousy ... And the princess who has to escape from both.

"I can't even trust the warrior who came to save me!!
I'm gonna escape from this place myself!"

Will she be able to escape from the castle of the unlimited?

▶Jump & Action!
Exciting running action through a touch of a finger!
When it comes to jumping, Tap! Tap!

▶Jump over it, beat it, and enjoy it!
When are you gonna do other things beside just jumping over it?
MADPRINCESS knows how to do a flying kick !
Enjoy your adventure as you jump over and beat the obstacles!

▶Several Retro-trend princesses!
There is more than one mad princess??
You can collect different styles of princesses!
